Class Level

java.lang.Object
  Level

public class Level
extends java.lang.Object

A level in the PaKman game. In every level the user has to gather the available pills without being eaten by a ghost. Every level specifies the layout of the maze (a rectangular grid of tiles), the number and position of the pills to gather, possible special pills, the initial position of the player and the number and initial position(s)of the ghosts. The present implementation is just a single fixed maze with player and ghost position.
